name: Warhammer Skulls Digital Goodie Pack
description:
This pack is available and free to claim only until 10th of June 2021, 5 PM UTC.



All warriors rejoice! To celebrate the Warhammer Skulls event, Games Workshop and GOG.COM have teamed up to present you with this awesome Warhammer Skulls Digital Goodie Pack that is available only in our store.

This pack includes:
  • A classic strategy game Warhammer: Shadow of the Horned Rat.
  • A batch of cool Warhammer Skulls and Adeptus Titanicus: Dominus wallpapers.
  • A World Eaters sampler from The Black Library in PDF, epub, and mobi.
  • A free Warhammer 40,000 Roleplay Adventure titled Rain of Mercy in PDF.
  • A Warhammer: Mark of Chaos – The Collected Concept Art album in PDF.
  • An original soundtrack from Warhammer 40,000: Mechanicus in FLAC and WAV.
  • A 15% off discount code for Warhammer merch (valid until 31st August 2021 for use in the official store)


Warhammer Skulls Digital Goodie Pack will appear in your library as two separate entries – a free game and a goodie pack. Please note that the goodies are accessible only through the browser, and will not be visible in your GOG GALAXY library. If you already own Warhammer: Shadow of the Horned Rat, the serial key to redeem the game will be added to your GOG library (please select the game in the library through your browser, then click "More", and check the “Serial Keys'' section). This serial key stays active until you redeem the game at any time in the future.
